tagline: A to-do list that helps you do
pitch:
Have your to-do lists ballooned to unmanageable sizes with half baked-ideas, things you really don't intend to accomplish anytime soon and old tasks collecting dust among the clutter?

Why not try a new- psychologist recommended- atomic approach to your productivity. A task manager that helps you focus on each task individually.

tagline: Stay focused on the task at hand
pitch:
Doing many things at once often ends with not finishing a single thing as your attention jumps from one issue to other while the clock mercilessly marches on.

Don't let the upcoming tasks and projects occupy your time and mind-space. Our unique approach makes sure you stay focused on one thing and one thing only.

tagline: Do the right things at the right time
